title: Hello, the Sharpshooter
overview: At the national competitions, trainee sports reporter Tang Xin was assigned to interview the 50-meter pistol shooting champion. She was surprised to find out that it was Shen Qing Yuan, her shooting instructor, whom she secretly loved four years ago. During the interview, Tang Xin was stunned by Shen Qing Yuan's cold and indifferent attitude and begins to stutter, which slightly destroys her career. Tang Xin finds reasons to approach Shen Qing Yuan and tries to solve the root of the problem. In the film crew, she meets a variety of participants, each of whom has his own unique story and life experience. Finally, she managed to prepare a report that was well received by the public and resolved her workplace crisis. With the help of psychologist Ding Fan, Tang Xin helps Shen Qing Yuan resolve the conflict in his heart and reconcile with his former comrade Du Lin Feng. Carrying dreams and love in their hearts, they stand together on the set, striving higher and higher to fame.Adapted from the novel of the same name by Lian Mu Chu Guang.
